eligibility.notes: 7-11 COD; opened ~12h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: Neutral
snadResult.reason: The buyer reports a crack in the blender cup, but the seller provides pre-shipment photos showing no cracks. There is no material mismatch or missing information. The issue does not qualify as SNAD.

primaryOption.label: Partial Refund & Keep Item
primaryOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:
Order: TW-13058
Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The buyer reports a crack in the blender cup, but the seller provides pre-shipment photos showing no cracks. There is no material mismatch or missing information. The issue does not qualify as SNAD.
Decision: Neutral
Outcome: The buyer successfully initiated a return, and the seller agreed to issue a full refund.
